example_en: telephone number, email address, network address, website

definition_en: An address that is a unique identifier for a specific location of a building.
Combination of street + number, postal code, city, country
A street name is an identifying name given to a street or road.
An address where a person lives.
An address where a person works or an organisations is located.
An address where you can send mail.
An uniquely addressable lockable box located on the premises of a post office station.
An address where a mail or delivery is shipped to.
An address of the person or organisation sending the mail or delivery.
synonyms_de: Anschrift des Absenders, Antwortadresse, Rücklieferadresse, Rücksendeadresse

definition_en: An address for billing an order.
An address for the registration of a person or organisation from a legal standpoint.
synonyms_de: juristische Anschrift, offizielle Anschrift, gesetzlicher Wohnsitz, Firmenanschrift
